notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: A.A.: executed the bioinformatics protocol, data analysis, interpretation and written the base manuscript; J.S.: involved in metallomic analysis; T.K.B. and G.G.: screen the participants; P.P.: over viewed the gene expression study; R.M.: Give critical suggestion on study concept, design, statistical analysis, and interpret the data; S.S.J.: study concept, design, pooled the data, interpret the data, finalized, and approve the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
